column12: Name of macrophyte group
Minimum above ground density of macrophyte (mmol C/m2)
Phyto max growth rate @20C (/day)
Specifies temperature limitation function of growth (-); 0 = no temperature limitation 1= CAEDYM style
Arrenhius temperature scaling for growth function (-)
Standard temperature (deg C)
Optimum temperature (deg C)
Maximum temperature (deg C)
Type of light response function [0 = no photoinhibition; 1 = photoinhibition]
Half saturation constant for light limitation of growth (microE/m^2/s) used if lightModel=0
saturating light intensity  (microE/m^2/s) used if lightModel=1
Specific attenuation coefficient  ((mmol C m^2^-1)^1 m^-1)
Fraction of primary production lost to exudation (-)
respiration/metabolic loss rate @ 20 (degC)
Arrhenius temperature scaling factor for respiration (-)
Type of salinity limitation function (-)
Salinity limitation value at maximum salinity S_maxsp (-)
Maximum salinity (g/kg)
Optimal salinity (g/kg)
Constant relating macrophyte density to drag coefficient
Fraction of primary production apportioned to below-ground biomass
Omega constant relating plant density to effective area of coverage
Internal C:Chl-a ratio of the plant leaves
Half-saturation concentration of nitrogen (mmol N/m^3)
Constant internal nitrogen concentration (mmol N/ mmol C)
Half-saturation concentration of phosphorus (mmol P/m^3)
Constant internal phosphorus concentration (mmol P/ mmol C)
